dialogStrings: Gongaga Village
Jungle
Meltdown Reactor
Weapons Store
Item Store
Inn
Inn
Zack's Home
Mayor's Home
Received "Titan" Materia!

Cannot take on anymore Materia.
Please discard some Materia.
Received "Deathblow" Materia!
Received "X-Potion"!
Received "White M-phone"!

“You a traveller? Hey wait,
that glow in your eye…
Are you in SOLDIER?”

“You a traveller? Hey wait,
that glow in your eye…
Are you in SOLDIER?”

“Oh, you're right!
Don't you know anything
about our son?”
“His name is Zack.”

“It's been close to 10 years since
he left for the city, saying that
he didn't want to live in the country…”

“He left saying
he's going to join SOLDIER.
You ever hear of a Zack in SOLDIER?”

{Cloud}
“Hmmm…I don't know.”

{Tifa}
“Zack…”
“Young lady, you know him?”

“I remember he wrote us 6 or 7 years ago
saying that he had a girlfriend.
Could that have been you?”

{Tifa}
“…No, it wasn't.”

{Aeris}
“Zack…”
“Do you know him, young lady?”

{Aeris}
“What a shock…
I didn't know Zack was
from this town.”

{Cloud}
“You know him?”

{Aeris}
“Didn't I tell you?
He was my first love.”

{Cloud}
“…”

{Aeris}
“Zack…
SOLDIER First Class.
Same as {Cloud}.”

{Cloud}
“Strange, there aren't that
many who make First Class,
but I've never heard of him.”

{Aeris}
“That's all right.
It's all in the past now.
I was just worried
because I heard he's been missing.”

{Cloud}
“Missing?”

{Aeris}
“I think it was five years ago.
He went out on a job,
and never came back.”

{Aeris}
“He loved women, a real lady's man.
He probably found someone else…”

{Aeris}
“Hey? What's wrong?”
{CHOICE}Poor guy
{CHOICE}(…jealous…envious…)

{Aeris}
“I don't really mind
that I haven't heard from him.
But I feel for his parents.”

{Aeris}
“Are you…jealous?
Hmm? Hmmm?
Are you, {Cloud}?”

{Aeris}
“I'm kidding. I'm sorry.”

{Aeris}
“I was hoping maybe you were…”

{Cloud}
“{Aeris}…”

{Aeris}
“Let's go, {Cloud}.”

{Tifa}
“Zack…”

{Cloud}
“Do you know him?”

{Tifa}
“N, no, I don't know him!”

{Cloud}
“Your face tells me differently.”

{Tifa}
“I told you, I don't!”

{Cloud}
“All right.”

{Tifa}
“…”

{Tifa}
“That sounds just like you,
leaving town, and saying
'I'm joining SOLDIER!'.”

{Cloud}
“There were a lot of guys
like that back then.”

{Tifa}
“You must really be something
making it in SOLDIER
out of a group like that.”{PAUSE}“I really respect you…”
{CHOICE}I just got lucky
{CHOICE}I worked hard for it

{Tifa}
“Don't be so humble!”

{Tifa}
“Hard work pays off, huh.”

{Tifa}
“You know…”{PAUSE}“I'm as proud of {Cloud}
joining SOLDIER
as if it were me.”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud},
thanks for caring.”

“A reactor explosion three years ago
took my husband…”

“Do people really need
reactors to live?”{PAUSE}“Aren't there more important
things in life?”

“You want something?”
{CHOICE}Buy weapons?
{CHOICE}Hear a story?
{CHOICE}Nothing in particular

“Huh, did you want something?”
{CHOICE}Buy accessories?
{CHOICE}Hear a story?
{CHOICE}Nothing in particular

“Uh, need somethin'?”
{CHOICE}Need a room?
{CHOICE}Hear a story?
{CHOICE}Nothing in particular

“Oh, you here to shop?”
{CHOICE}Buy items?
{CHOICE}Hear a story?
{CHOICE}Nothing in particular

“This is Gongaga Village.
Many people died here in a
Mako reactor explosion.”

“The Shinra people told us
that everyone would be happy
once the reactor was built.
But all it brought us was sadness…”

“Shinra built the reactor,
without even thinking about
the town's safety.
And, this is the result.”

“One day, a huge explosion
killed many of the townspeople…”

“It's been a while since the explosion,
but you can still find the
pieces it left all over town.”

“We voted to outlaw the use of
Mako energy and live with nature,
ever since the explosion.”

“People can live without
the Shinra's Mako Reactors.”

“No matter how much I pray,
it won't bring our grandson back…”

“…You don't have enough money.
Come back when you get some.”

“It's 80 Gil a night.”
{CHOICE}Pay up
{CHOICE}Don't pay

{Party #1}
“There's something shiny back there…”
{CHOICE}Don't do anything
{CHOICE}Reach for it

{Party #1}
“A ruined reactor.”

{Cloud}
“{Aeris}…”

{Cloud}
“{Tifa}…
What happened?”

{Cloud}
“What happened to you two?”

{Cloud}
“…Zack.”{PAUSE}“Zack.
I don't know anything
about that man.”{PAUSE}“…But
That name sounds familiar…”{PAUSE}“Why?”

{Aeris}
“That can't…”

“Have you ever met someone
in SOLDIER named Zack?”

“I can't believe he hasn't
contacted us in 10 years…!
…After all, we're his parents.”

“It's 300 Gil a night.”
{CHOICE}Pay 300 Gil
{CHOICE}Don't pay

“I am a traveling salesman,
going around the world.”{PAUSE}“I came because I heard that near
this village was Materia strong
enough to shake the earth.”{PAUSE}“Even I get homesick and want
to see my family.”{PAUSE}“I have a favor to ask of you.
Can you get this letter to my lovely wife?”{PAUSE}“Will you do it for me?”
Take the letter
{CHOICE}Not interested

“My wife lives in Kalm.
I really appreciate this.”

“What's going on
in a world about to end?
Is kindness the first to vanish?”

“They sell the weapons
on the second floor.
Climb up the pole to get there.”

“Lifestream?
Never heard of it.”{PAUSE}“Planet structure?
…Who cares about that?”{PAUSE}“Why don't you go ask
Bugenhagen of Cosmo Canyon
hard questions like that?”

“Seems like the Shinra is planning
something big to destroy Meteor…”{PAUSE}“I heard they're going to do something
with all that Huge Materia
they've been gathering…”{PAUSE}“After what happened with the reactor
you can't trust Shinra.”

“…Everyone's going to die.
Everything's coming to an end.”

“You lost?
When that happens the only ones
you can count on are your friends.”{PAUSE}“The first thing you gotta do
is find your best friend.”

“This reactor's useless,
but I hear there's still Huge Materia
at the {CYAN}Corel{WHITE}, {CYAN}Fort Condor{WHITE},
and the {CYAN}Junon{WHITE} reactors.”{PAUSE}“Shinra's gathering all the Materia
from those places…
But for what?”

“Shinra's tried a lot of things,
but it's only HUMAN.
It's fate that Meteor will
kill the people.”
“Tell me, young man.”

“Can't we be happy without
having to sacrifice anything?”

“Can't time pass
without unhappiness?”

{Red XIII}
“Hey, {Cloud}.
How did the Turks know to
wait and ambush us here?”

{Red XIII}
“…You'd think someone told
the Shinra about us?”

{Cloud}
“…Is someone there?”

Reno
“Hey, Rude.
Who do you like?”

Reno
“What are you getting so
embarrassed about?
Come on? Who do you like?”

Rude
“…{Tifa}.”

Reno
“Hmm…”

Reno
“That's a tough one.”

Reno
“But, poor Elena.
She…you…”

Rude
“No, she likes Tseng.”

Reno
“I never knew that!
But Tseng likes that Ancient…”

{Cloud}
“What are they talking about?”

Elena
“It's so stupid!”{PAUSE}“They always talk about who
they like or don't like.
But Tseng is different.”

Elena
“Ah! Oh no!”

Elena
“They're here!
They're really here!”

Reno
“Hmm…
Then it's time…”

Reno
“Rude…don't go easy on them
even the girls.”

Rude
“…Don't worry, I'll do my job.”

Elena
“Then, we're counting on you.
I'll report to Tseng!”

Reno
“It's been a while.”

Reno
“Payback time for what you did in Sector 7.”
{CHOICE}Sector 7?
{CHOICE}Out of our way

Reno
“That's sad.”

Reno
“I don't like being taken for a fool.”

{Tifa}
“Hey, something seems wrong,
Like they knew we were coming.”

{Aeris}
“…How could they know
we were coming here.”

{Barret}
“I don't like it.
How'd they find out
where we were?”

{Red XIII}
“Interesting…
They were definitely
waiting for us.”

{Yuffie}
“I don't like this!
It's like the whole world knows
where we're going.”

{Cait Sith}
“How'd they know that we were here?”

{Vincent}
“How did they know that
we were here?”

{Cloud}
“They followed us…
But there weren't any signs of it.
Then, that means…”

{Tifa}
“A spy? No way.”

{Aeris}
“That there's a Shinra spy…”

{Barret}
“A spy, maybe?
No, no way.”

{Red XIII}
“…someone's been informing them.”

{Yuffie}
“Maybe it's someone
in this group?”

{Cait Sith}
“You don't think there's a spy,
do you {Cloud}?”{PAUSE}“I hate this.
Now everyone's gonna blame me
because I'm new.”

{Vincent}
“It means there's a Shinra spy…”

{Cloud}
“I don't even want to think
about there being a spy…”

{Cloud}
“I trust everyone.”

Rude
“That's as far as you go.”

{Cid}
“Man, looks like
they've taken a short cut.”

{Cid}
“And a couple of Shinra dogs
are here too!”

{Barret}
“The Shinra build reactors to make money.
And this is what happens.”

{Barret}
“You saw that village.
It's always the powerless that
suffer from tyrants like Shinra.”{PAUSE}“The one's with the power control those
without it.
That's just the way of the world now.”{PAUSE}“But I can't let 'em do that.
That's why I formed AVALANCHE to fight 'em.”

{Barret}
“…Yo, {Cloud}
You still gonna fight with us, right?”{PAUSE}“We need you, man."
{CHOICE}You got it
{CHOICE}Not interested

{Barret}
“Thanks, man.”

{Barret}
“…!!”{PAUSE}
“!!”{PAUSE}“I never shoulda
believed you.”

Scarlet
“This reactor's a failure.”{PAUSE}“What I'm looking for is
big, large, Huge Materia.
You seen any?”

Tseng
“…No I haven't seen it.
I'll get on it right away.”

Scarlet
“Please.
We could make the ultimate weapon
if we only had some.”

Tseng
“I just can't wait.”

Scarlet
“With Hojo gone,
the Weapon Development's
been getting a bigger budget.”

Tseng
“I envy them.”

Scarlet
“But, even if we make
the perfect weapon, could that
stupid Heidegger even use it?”

Tseng
“…”

Scarlet
“Oh…sorry!
I forgot Heidegger was your boss!
Ha ha ha!”

Scarlet
“Let's go!”

{Cloud}
“…Big, large, Huge Materia?”{PAUSE}“An ultimate weapon?
The perfect weapon?”{PAUSE}“Just what are
the Shinra up to?”

{Cloud}
“It's Scarlet,
Head of Shinra Weapon Development.”

Scarlet
“Hmph!
This isn't any good either.”{PAUSE}“You only get junky Materia
from junky reactors.”

{Barret}
“You look like you was havin'
a nightmare.”{PAUSE}“How are you feeling?”
{CHOICE}I seem to be OK
{CHOICE}Not good
{CHOICE}Don't really know

{Barret}
“That's good.
Man, I didn't know
what was gonna happen.”

{Barret}
“Oh…
Better keep it to yourself.”

{Barret}
“I guess that's right.
Well, don't worry
too much about it.”

{Tifa}
“You know, {Cloud}.
{Aeris} is gone.”

{Barret}
“Everyone's out looking
for {Aeris}.”

{Cloud}
“…The City of the Ancients.
{Aeris} is headed there.”

{Barret}
“By herself!?
Why did she go by herself!?”

{Barret}
“Hey, we're goin' too.”

{Cloud}
“Only the Ancients, only {Aeris}
can save us from Meteor…”

{Tifa}
“Then we must go.
What'll we do if something
happens to {Aeris}?
If Sephiroth finds her,
she's in trouble.”

{Cloud}
“Sephiroth…already knows.”

{Barret}
“Hey!
Why are you still
sittin' around?”

{Tifa}
“Let's go, {Cloud}.”

{Cloud}
“No.”

{Cloud}
“I might lose it again.”

{Cloud}
“If Sephiroth comes near me
I might…”

{Barret}
“Yeah, godammit!
It's because of you that Sephiroth
got the Black Materia
in the first place.
It's your damn fault!”

{Cloud}
“My fault?”

{Barret}
“I know you got problems…
Hell, we all do.
But you don't even
understand yourself.”

{Barret}
“But you gotta understand that
there ain't no gettin' offa
this train we're on,
till we get to the end of the line.”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}, we came this far…
Aren't you going to settle up
with Sephiroth?”

{Barret}
“Goddamn jackass,
that's what you are…”{PAUSE}“Just think about it…
How many people in this world
do ya think
really understand themselves?”{PAUSE}“People get depressed in life
because they don't know what's up.”{PAUSE}“But, they go on living.
They don't run away…
That's just how it is.”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}…you'll come with us, right?
I believe in you.”

{Cloud}
“No…”{PAUSE}“I'm afraid.”{PAUSE}“If this keeps up,
I may go crazy!”{PAUSE}“I'm afraid…”

{Cloud}
“What…am I supposed to do?”{PAUSE}“Just pull out of here?”{PAUSE}“To where?”

{Barret}
“Wait a minute, {Tifa}.
give him a little time.”{PAUSE}“He has to decide this
on his own.”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}…”

{Barret}
“You believe in {Cloud}…
right?”

“You awake?”{PAUSE}“Those people were so worried
that they stayed by your side
until you woke up.”{PAUSE}“You sure do have good friends.”

{Barret}
“Hey, how are you?”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}…”

{Barret}
“I just wanna know,
which is it gonna be?”{PAUSE}“You wanna find out about yourself?
Or are you afraid to find out?”{PAUSE}“Either way, if you stay around here
all you're gonna
do is worry about it.”{PAUSE}“Even if you do go nuts again when
you see Sephiroth…
If it happens, it happens.”{PAUSE}“I'll go upside
your spikey head
and bring you back to normal!”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}, it'll be all right.
We're all with you.”

{Cloud}
“But…”

{Barret}
“If it happens, it happens.
Don't worry 'bout it.”

{Cloud}
“…You're…right.
He's right, isn't he?”

{Tifa}
“Come on,
let's go and find {Aeris}.”

{Cloud}
“…I'm afraid to find out the truth.
But…why?”

Reno
“This is just part of the job.
Don't take it personally.”
